Package org.matrix.androidsdk.crypto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MXCrypto.IRoomKeysRequestListener
    Room keys events listener
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IncomingRoomKeyRequest
    IncomingRoomKeyRequest class defines the incoming room keys request.
    IncomingRoomKeyRequestCancellation
    IncomingRoomKeyRequestCancellation describes the incoming room key cancellation.
    MXCrypto
    A `MXCrypto` class instance manages the end-to-end crypto for a MXSession instance.
    MXCryptoAlgorithms  
    MXCryptoError
    Represents a standard error response.
    MXDeviceList  
    MXEncryptedAttachments  
    MXEncryptedAttachments.EncryptionResult
    Define the result of an encryption file
    MXEventDecryptionResult
    The result of a (successful) call to decryptEvent.
    MXMegolmExportEncryption
    Utility class to import/export the crypto data
    MXOlmDevice  
    MXOutgoingRoomKeyRequestManager  
    OutgoingRoomKeyRequest
    Represents an outgoing room key request
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OutgoingRoomKeyRequest.RequestState
    possible states for a room key request The state machine looks like: | V (cancellation requested) UNSENT -----------------------------+ | | | (send successful) | V | SENT | | | | (cancellation requested) | V | CANCELLATION_PENDING | | | | (cancellation sent) | V | (deleted) <---------------------------+
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MXDecryptionException
    This class represents a decryption exception
